description:
dispatched_by: mayor

Update ContextBuilder to include scene context in AI generation. Include: current scene (name, type, mood, stakes, turn count), available next scenes, scene history summary. Handle no active scene gracefully.

title: NARR-013: Add Scene API routes
description:
dispatched_by: mayor

Add REST API routes for scene management. Endpoints: list scenes, create, available, current, start, complete, get details, add connection. Zod validation, invalid transition errors.

title: NARR-014: Implement Scene management UI
description:
dispatched_by: mayor

Add UI components for DM to manage scenes. Scene indicator in game view, DM scene panel with current scene details, end scene button, available scenes, creation form. Scene timeline/history view.

title: NARR-015: Write narrative structure documentation
description:
dispatched_by: mayor

Write comprehensive documentation: API docs, scene types and usage, mood/stakes guidelines, connection requirements syntax, DM guide, developer guide for extending scene types, example scene flows.

title: NARR-002: Create scene_connections table migration
description:
dispatched_by: mayor

Create SQLite migration for scene_connections table defining possible paths between scenes. Columns: id, game_id, from_scene_id, to_scene_id, requirements (JSON), connection_type, description.

title: NARR-003: Create scene_availability table migration
description:
dispatched_by: mayor

Create SQLite migration for tracking which scenes are unlocked for a game. Columns: game_id, scene_id (composite PK), unlocked_turn, unlocked_by.

title: NARR-004: Create scene_flags migration and games.current_scene_id
description:
dispatched_by: mayor

Create scene_flags table for scene-specific flags (reset on scene change). Add current_scene_id column to games table (nullable FK to scenes).

title: NARR-005: Implement SceneRepository
description:
dispatched_by: mayor

Implement SceneRepository class for CRUD operations on scenes. Methods: create, findById, findByGame, findActive, findAvailable, startScene, completeScene, getEventsInScene.

title: NARR-006: Implement SceneConnectionRepository
description:
dispatched_by: mayor

Implement SceneConnectionRepository class for managing scene connections. Methods: create, findById, findFromScene, findToScene, getUnlockedConnections, delete.

title: NARR-007: Implement SceneAvailabilityRepository
description:
dispatched_by: mayor

Implement SceneAvailabilityRepository for tracking unlocked scenes. Methods: unlock, isUnlocked, getUnlocked, getUnlockInfo. Handle unlock idempotency.

title: NARR-008: Implement SceneManager service
description:
dispatched_by: mayor

Implement core SceneManager service coordinating scene operations. Methods: createScene, startScene, completeScene, getAvailableScenes, getSceneSummary. Emits scene events. Updates games.current_scene_id.

title: NARR-009: Implement scene boundary detection
description:
dispatched_by: mayor

Implement automatic scene boundary suggestion based on game events. Detect: location change, major confrontation resolved, significant mood shift, long scene duration. Configurable thresholds, advisory only.

title: Fix pre-existing pixelsrc test failures (validator + renderer WASM)
Deacon Patrol
description: Mayor's daemon patrol loop for handling callbacks, health checks, and cleanup.

title: Witness Patrol
description: Per-rig worker monitor patrol loop with progressive nudging.

title: Pixelsrc Integration
description: Integrate pixelsrc for procedurally generated pixel art portraits, scenes, and animations. 16 tasks. Can run parallel to Chronicle epics.

title: PXLS-001: Add @pixelsrc/wasm dependency to server
description:
dispatched_by: mayor

Add pixelsrc WASM package to server for validation and rendering. Initialize WASM module in Node.js environment. Basic smoke test: validate sprite, render to PNG.

title: PXLS-010: Add pixel art API endpoints
description:
dispatched_by: mayor

Add REST API routes: GET /api/game/:id/pixelart/:entityType/:entityId, POST regenerate. Retrieval loads from filesystem, regeneration triggers full generation/validation loop. Zod validation.

title: PXLS-011: Add @pixelsrc/wasm to client
description:
dispatched_by: mayor

Add pixelsrc WASM package to client for browser-side rendering. Create PixelsrcRenderer service: init(), render(source, spriteName), listSprites(source). Cache rendered frames for performance.

title: PXLS-012: Implement AnimatedAvatar component
description:
dispatched_by: mayor

Create component that renders animated pixel art avatars. Renders to 64x64 canvas. Animation state machine: idle (breathing), talking (during TTS). Methods: play, stop, startSpeaking, stopSpeaking, getElement, destroy.

title: PXLS-013: Integrate AnimatedAvatar with UI
description:
dispatched_by: mayor

Replace avatar placeholders with AnimatedAvatar in existing components. Update CharacterCard, PartyPanel, SpeechBubble integration (startSpeaking/stopSpeaking). Central AvatarManager service. Graceful degradation if WASM fails.

title: PXLS-014: Implement scene backgrounds
description:
dispatched_by: mayor

Add pixel art scene backgrounds to AreaPanel. Scene generation prompts in PixelsrcGenerator. Areas get pixelArtRef during world generation. Support ambient animations (palette cycling). Fallback to text-only if no art.

title: PXLS-015: Implement art evolution system
description:
dispatched_by: mayor

Create ArtEvolutionService for evolving character art over game progression. Triggers: act transitions, major events, status effects, equipment changes. Strategies: variant (palette swap), composition (layers), regenerate (full new). Archive history.

title: PXLS-016: Write pixelsrc integration documentation
description:
dispatched_by: mayor

Write comprehensive documentation: architecture, data flow, WASM usage, API docs, project structure, art evolution rules, troubleshooting guide (WASM init, generation failures, visual validation), developer guide.

title: PXLS-002: Implement PixelsrcProjectManager
description:
dispatched_by: mayor

Create service for managing pixelsrc project directories for each game. Methods: initialize, getProjectPath, writeFile, readFile, deleteProject. Directory structure: palettes, characters, npcs, scenes, effects, evolved.

title: PXLS-003: Implement PixelsrcValidator
description:
dispatched_by: mayor

Create WASM-based validation service for pixelsrc source. Method: validate(source) returns errors/warnings with line numbers. ValidationResult interface with valid, errors, warnings.

title: PXLS-004: Implement PixelsrcRenderer
description:
dispatched_by: mayor

Create WASM-based rendering service for pixelsrc source. Methods: renderToPng(source, spriteName, options), listSprites(source). Options include scale factor. Returns Uint8Array of PNG data.

title: PXLS-005: Add PixelArtRef types to shared package
description:
dispatched_by: mayor

Add TypeScript types: PixelArtRef, PixelArt, PixelArtAnimation, AnimationState. Extend Character, NPC, Area with pixelArtRef. Extend GameState with pixelsrcProject and act.

title: PXLS-006: Implement PixelsrcGenerator with primer
description:
dispatched_by: mayor

Create prompt builder that generates pixelsrc content via AI with format primer. Methods: generatePortrait, generateScene, generatePalette. Load primer from bundled file. Returns raw .pxl source string.

title: PXLS-007: Implement PixelsrcRepairer
description:
dispatched_by: mayor

Create repair service that uses AI to fix invalid pixelsrc source. Method: repair(source, validationResult, context). Retry loop up to 3 times. Returns RepairResult with success status and final source.

title: PXLS-008: Implement PixelsrcVisualValidator
description:
dispatched_by: mayor

Create visual validation service using AI to review rendered output. Method: validate(source, context). Render at 4x scale, send to Claude for approval. Returns VisualValidationResult with approved boolean and feedback.

title: PXLS-009: Integrate pixelsrc with WorldGenerator
description:
dispatched_by: mayor

Update WorldGenerator to create pixelsrc project and generate art during world creation. Full validation loop: generate, validate, repair if needed, visual validation, write file, set pixelArtRef. Failures logged but don't block.

title: Structured Events
description: Enable queryable event patterns for AI context and emergence detection. 12 tasks. Depends on entity-evolution epic.

title: SEVT-001: Extend events table with structured fields
description:
dispatched_by: mayor

Add structured fields to existing events table for queryable event data. Columns: event_type, action, actor_type, actor_id, target_type, target_id, witnesses (JSON), tags (JSON). Backward compatible.

title: SEVT-010: Add Structured Events API routes
description:
dispatched_by: mayor

Add REST API routes for querying structured events and patterns. Endpoints: events by-action, by-actor, by-target, patterns, emergence. Support pagination and query validation.

title: SEVT-011: Implement DM emergence notifications
description:
dispatched_by: mayor

Add UI notifications for DM when emergence opportunities detected. Show entity, emergence type, confidence, key factors. DM can dismiss or acknowledge. SSE for real-time updates.

title: SEVT-012: Write structured events documentation
description:
dispatched_by: mayor

Write comprehensive documentation: API docs for event query endpoints, action vocabulary reference, pattern analysis explanation, emergence detection rules, integration guide.

title: SEVT-002: Define action vocabulary constants
description:
dispatched_by: mayor

Create TypeScript constants and types for standardized action vocabulary. Categories: Mercy, Violence, Honesty, Social, Exploration, Character. Helper functions: isActionInCategory, getActionCategory.

title: SEVT-003: Implement EventBuilder service
description:
dispatched_by: mayor

Create EventBuilder service constructing structured events from AI-generated content. Methods: buildFromGeneration, determineActor, extractTargets, extractWitnesses, generateTags.

title: SEVT-004: Implement ActionClassifier service
description:
dispatched_by: mayor

Create ActionClassifier classifying narrative content into standardized actions. Rule-based classification for speed, AI fallback for unclear content. Returns action and confidence score.

title: SEVT-005: Extend EventRepository with structured queries
description:
dispatched_by: mayor

Add query methods to EventRepository: findByActions, countByActions, findByActor, findByTarget, findWitnessedBy, findByTag, getActionSummary. Handle JSON queries for witnesses/tags.

title: SEVT-006: Implement PatternObserver service
description:
dispatched_by: mayor

Create PatternObserver analyzing player behavior patterns from event history. Methods: getPlayerPatterns, calculateRatio, calculateViolenceInitiation, classifySocialApproach, inferDominantTraits.

title: SEVT-007: Implement EmergenceObserver service
description:
dispatched_by: mayor

Create EmergenceObserver detecting narrative emergence opportunities (villain/ally emergence). Methods: onEventCommitted, checkVillainEmergence, checkAllyEmergence, calculateConfidence. Uses relationship thresholds.

title: SEVT-008: Integrate EventBuilder with ContentPipeline
description:
dispatched_by: mayor

Update ContentPipeline to use EventBuilder for structured event creation. Call emergenceObserver.onEventCommitted() after commit. Update AI prompt to request structured metadata.

title: SEVT-009: Integrate PatternObserver with ContextBuilder
description:
dispatched_by: mayor

Update ContextBuilder to include player patterns in AI generation context. Include mercy ratio, honesty ratio, inferred dominant traits, social approach classification, emergence opportunities.

title: Entity Evolution
description: Track how entities (characters, NPCs, locations) evolve through play via traits and relationships. Foundation epic with 15 tasks.

title: EVOL-001: Create entity_traits table migration
description:
dispatched_by: mayor

Create SQLite migration for entity_traits table storing traits acquired by entities during gameplay. Columns: id, game_id, entity_type, entity_id, trait, acquired_turn, source_event_id, status, created_at.

title: EVOL-010: Implement system evolution detection
description:
dispatched_by: mayor

Implement rules-based evolution detection suggesting evolutions based on game events without AI input. Detect trait suggestions from repeated actions, relationship changes from event targets.

title: EVOL-011: Integrate EvolutionService with ContentPipeline
description:
dispatched_by: mayor

Update ContentPipeline to detect evolutions after AI generates content. Parse AI suggestions from response metadata, queue pending evolutions for DM review.

title: EVOL-012: Integrate EvolutionService with ContextBuilder
description:
dispatched_by: mayor

Update ContextBuilder to include traits and relationships in AI generation context. Include player traits, NPC traits for current area, relationships with aggregate labels.

title: EVOL-013: Add Evolution API routes
description:
dispatched_by: mayor

Add REST API routes for evolution management. Endpoints: GET/POST evolutions, approve, edit, refuse, GET traits, GET relationships. Zod validation.

title: EVOL-014: Implement DM approval UI
description:
dispatched_by: mayor

Add UI components for DM to review and manage pending evolutions. Show entity, evolution type, suggested change, reason, source event. Actions: Approve, Edit, Refuse.

title: EVOL-015: Write entity evolution documentation
description:
dispatched_by: mayor

Write comprehensive documentation: API docs, architecture, data model, service interactions, event flow, DM guide, developer guide for extending trait catalog, aggregate label rules.

title: EVOL-002: Create relationships table migration
description:
dispatched_by: mayor

Create SQLite migration for relationships table tracking multi-dimensional relationships between entities. Dimensions: trust, respect, affection, fear, resentment, debt.

title: EVOL-003: Create pending_evolutions table migration
description:
dispatched_by: mayor

Create SQLite migration for pending_evolutions table queueing evolution suggestions for DM review. Status: pending, approved, edited, refused.

title: EVOL-004: Create trait_catalog table with seed data
description:
dispatched_by: mayor

Create SQLite migration for trait_catalog table and seed with predefined trait vocabulary. 24 traits across 4 categories: Moral, Emotional, Capability, Reputation.

title: EVOL-005: Implement TraitRepository
description:
dispatched_by: mayor

Implement TraitRepository class for CRUD operations on entity traits. Methods: addTrait, removeTrait, findByEntity, findByTrait, getTraitHistory, getTraitCatalog.

title: EVOL-006: Implement RelationshipRepository
description:
dispatched_by: mayor

Implement RelationshipRepository class for CRUD operations on entity relationships. Methods: upsert, findBetween, findByEntity, findByThreshold, updateDimension.

title: EVOL-007: Implement PendingEvolutionRepository
description:
dispatched_by: mayor

Implement PendingEvolutionRepository class for managing evolution suggestions awaiting DM review. Methods: create, findById, findPending, resolve, update, deleteByGame.

title: EVOL-008: Implement EvolutionService
description:
dispatched_by: mayor

Implement core EvolutionService coordinating trait and relationship management. Methods: detectEvolutions, approve, edit, refuse, getEntitySummary. Emits evolution events.

title: EVOL-009: Implement aggregate label computation
description:
dispatched_by: mayor

Implement algorithm computing human-readable relationship labels from numeric dimensions. Labels: devoted, allied, friendly, rival, terrified, hostile, indifferent, etc.

Export Layer
description: Git-diffable game state for persistence, sharing, and derivative works. 10 tasks. Backlog status - depends on narrative-structure epic.

title: EXPT-001: Define export format specification
description:
dispatched_by: mayor

Define the TOML/JSON export format specification for game state. TOML for human-readable, JSON for single-file, JSONL for event log. Version field for format versioning. Schema documentation.

title: EXPT-010: Write export layer documentation
description:
dispatched_by: mayor

Documentation for export/import functionality. Export format specification, import guide, Git workflow guide, comic generation guide.

title: EXPT-002: Implement TOML exporter
description:
dispatched_by: mayor

Export game state as directory of TOML files. Structure: game.toml, characters/, npcs/, locations/, scenes/, traits.toml, relationships.toml. Git-friendly diffable format.

title: EXPT-003: Implement JSON exporter
description:
dispatched_by: mayor

Export complete game state as single JSON file. Suitable for API transfer. Compressed option available.

title: EXPT-004: Implement JSONL event exporter
description:
dispatched_by: mayor

Export event log as append-only JSONL file. One event per line, chronological order, includes structured event fields.

title: EXPT-005: Implement import service
description:
dispatched_by: mayor

Import exported game state into new game session. Support TOML directory and JSON file. Validate imported data. Handle version mismatches gracefully.

title: EXPT-006: Implement Git integration
description:
dispatched_by: mayor

Optional Git commit on save. Initialize git repo for exports, commit on save with message, optional push to remote. OAuth for GitHub/GitLab authentication.

title: EXPT-007: Add Export API routes
description:
dispatched_by: mayor

REST API for export/import operations. Endpoints: POST game export, POST game import, GET export status.

title: EXPT-008: Implement Export UI
description:
dispatched_by: mayor

UI for exporting and importing games. Export button with format selection, import wizard, git sync status display.

title: EXPT-009: Implement comic/transcript generation
description:
dispatched_by: mayor

Generate comics or transcripts from event history. Scene selection for comic, panel layout generation, transcript export (markdown/plain text), PDF export.
